item.title: Photos from Venice, Italy
item.description: Here are a few photos I took while in Venice, Italy.

item.title: Beautiful Island of Santorini, Greece
item.description: Here are a few photographs I took on a clear sunny day in the island of Santorini, Greece. Beautiful city carved out of a violent burst of volcano - shows the greatness of humanity and what we can overcome with endurance and strength!
